briefTitle: Safety and Immunogenicity of A/H1N1-SOIV (Swine Flu) Vaccine With and Without Adjuvant in Children (3 to < 9 Years)
officialTitle: A Pivotal Randomized, Single-Blind, Dose-Finding Study to Evaluate Immunogenicity, Safety and Tolerability of Different Formulations of an Adjuvanted and Non-Adjuvanted Egg-Derived, Inactivated Novel Swine Origin A/H1N1 Monovalent Subunit Influenza Virus Vaccine in Healthy Pediatric Subjects 3 to < 9 Years of Age
summary: This study will evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of different combinations of A/H1N1 S-OIV (swine flu) vaccine in healthy young children.

primaryOutcome.measure: Antibody Responses According to the Hemagglutinin Inhibition (HI) Assay After the First and Second Vaccinations
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Day 22, Day 29, Day 43, Day 202 and Day 387
